nodes.text: The Fallann hyper-rifle was a type of weapon that was favored by many Rodian hunters.

It shot self-propelled shells that were very accurate over a great distance. It was traditionally used during the Midnight Hunter's Duel, a Rodian custom for when two hunters had a dispute that could not be resolved any other way.
The bounty hunter Aurra Sing was known to have possessed a Fallann among her weaponry.
